gym_koori_040_receptionist_00:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
Welcome\r
to\r
the\r
Glaseado Gym.
gym_koori_040_receptionist_01:
Do you want to face the Sub-zero Shredder
himself, Gym Leader Grusha?
gym_koori_040_receptionist_02:
Very well. Allow me to show you to the
battle court.
gym_koori_040_receptionist_03:
Of course. Please feel free to come speak to me
whenever you’re ready.
gym_koori_040_koori_03:
My name’s Grusha. I’m a snowboarder. Used to
be pro, actually.\c
Now I’m a Gym Leader.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_04:
I saw you on the slopes. Your skills... Yeah, they
were pretty cool.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_05: But don’t let that go to your head.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_06:
Winter mountains are dangerous. They can throw
your life right off course, easy as that.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_07:
Same thing with Pokémon battles, really...
It’s always the most dangerous when you’re\r
just starting to get the hang of things.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_08:
Today’s not a great day to face me, you know...
You’re better off giving up.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_09: You sure you want to battle me?[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_10: Still tryin’ to act cool, huh? That’s too bad.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_11:
Nice. Backing off takes its own kind of courage.
But I know your type. You always choose to push\r
forward in the end.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_12:
Well, this is my job now...so don’t take what
I’m about to do personally.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_13: Get ready to feel the icy bite of reality.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_14:
That burning passion you have... You strive for
the future, no matter what challenges you face.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_15: Just like how I used to be...[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_16:
Oh, never mind. I should give you your
Gym Badge.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_17:
Huh? You want a photo together to
commemorate your win...?[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_18:
C-come on, that’s...that’s so uncool.
I don’t usually do that sort of thing, but...\r
OK, fine. Special occasion.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_badge:
With [VAR NUM1(0001)] Gym Badge[VAR NUMBRNCH(0001,0100)]s, you should be able to catch
Pokémon of up to Lv. [VAR NUM2(0002)] more easily.\c
They’ll actually listen to you too, which is nice.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_badge_all:
With 8 Gym Badges, you should be able to catch
Pokémon of any level. They’ll also listen to every\r
word you say, whether it’s cool or not.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_waza:
Oh, and before I forget—you should take
this, too.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_19:
Should be a lot more useful than some silly
photo of you and me...[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_koori_20:
Feel free to stop by again... If you don’t mind the
cold, that is.[VAR 0114(001A)]
gym_koori_040_receptionist_04:
Congratulations! You’re now certified by the
Glaseado Gym!
